item.title: Synadia and TigerBeetle Commit $512k USD to the Zig Software Foundation

item.title: DNA reveals the real killers that brought down Napoleon's army
item.description:
Tales from the past DNA reveals the real killers that brought down Napoleon’s army Study identifies the two pathogens that helped destroy Napoleon’s Grande Armée during its 1812 retreat from Russia.

DNA reveals the real killers that brought down Napoleon’s army

Study identifies the two pathogens that helped destroy Napoleon’s Grande Armée during its 1812 retreat from Russia.

Historians have long debated which pathogens contributed to this catastrophe.

Read more
